thread.title: Jon Gruden believes Mitch Trubisky can handle Browns' hometown pressure and 'he'll be a real steal for somebody'
thread.title_full: Jon Gruden believes Mitch Trubisky can handle Browns' hometown pressure and 'he'll be a real steal for somebody'

author: Mary Kay Cabot, cleveland.com
title: Jon Gruden believes Mitch Trubisky can handle Browns' hometown pressure and 'he'll be a real steal for somebody'
text: Jon Gruden spent time with Mitch Trubisky Monday for his "QB Camp'' series and believes 'he'll be a real steal for somebody.'
